jobDesc: Developed and maintained the admin's website using the Typescript and NextJS framework.
Worked in a team of 3, while collaborating with the UI/UX team and Back-end developers.
Migrated Styled-Components to TailwindCSS to make the code cleaner.
Implemented the UI/UX design of a new feature called 'Promote' from scratch.
Designed and developed Zada and County platform using PHP programming language with Laravel framework.
Designed and developed user interface and user experience for the project application.
Implemented designs into HTML, CSS, and Javascript code for the project application with the help of TailwindCSS and alpineJS library.
Ensured the quality and responsiveness of the user interface and user experience.

projects.title: Invits.co
projects.desc:
Invits.co is a web-based wedding invitation service that can be accessed online. The website caters to two types of users, namely clients and guests. Clients have the ability to place orders, customize invitations, manage guests, and more. Guests can open the invitation through the link provided.
Invits.co was a project we used for the 'Software Project' course, but we are currently continuing its development with the hope of turning it into a real business.
jobDesc: Developed a cohesive and visually appealing UI design and Ensured the website's responsiveness and adaptability across various devices.
Worked in a team of 4 to develop and maintain a project application system using PHP programming language with Laravel framework.
Implemented designs into HTML, CSS, and Javascript code with the help of TailwindCSS & AlpineJS library.
Tested and debugged the website for cross-browser and device compatibility.

projects.title: Zada
projects.desc:
Zada is a web-based platform for renting boats, cars, motorcycles, and tour guides in a specific region. The website features three roles: User, Admin, and Partner. Users can place orders and manage their bookings. Admins can perform CRUD operations on the database. Partners can manage their own products and also receive payments.
Zada is one of the projects I worked on for SwitchBox. The project lasted for 5 months and was developed by a team of 3 people.
jobDesc: Developed Zada platform using PHP programming language with Laravel framework.
Designed user interface and user experience for the project application.
Implemented designs into HTML, CSS, and Javascript code for the project application with the help of TailwindCSS and alpineJS library
Ensured the quality and responsiveness of the user interface and user experience.

projects.title: County Management System
projects.desc:
County Management System is a web-based platform used by the government of Babahayo, Ecuador, for the management of specific documents. The website features two roles: Citizen and Admin. Citizens can submit document applications and make payments. Admins can manage and process the submitted documents. The Admin role is further divided into four sections: department admin, general admin, staff admin, and collection admin, each with specific access and limitations.
County Management System is one of the projects I worked on for SwitchBox. I was involved in this project for 1 month as part of a team consisting of 4 people.
jobDesc: Developed County platform using PHP programming language with Laravel framework.
Designed user interface and user experience for the project application.
Implemented designs into HTML, CSS, and Javascript code for the project application with the help of TailwindCSS and alpineJS library
Ensured the quality and responsiveness of the user interface and user experience.
